summary: When Martin, a former GDR citizen, is released from jail, he lately becomes confronted with the consequences of the German re-unification.
cast: Jörg Schüttauf|Julia Jäger|Robin Becker|Robert Lohr|Tom Jahn|Valentin Platareanu|Edita Malovcic|Oscar Martínez|Carmen-Maja Antoni|Udo Kroschwald|Dirk Borchardt|Dieter Jäger|Falko Freitag|Inga Dietrich|Rainer Reiners|Jürgen Rotzoll|Isabelle Stoffel|Anika Petzold|Doris Abeßer|Sabine Rieck|Florian Appl|Dido Marie Laux|Robert Munzinger|Christoph Janz|Mirko Borscht|Elke Hauck|Dirk Schoedon|Heesook Sohn|Anke Sonnentag
title: Berlin Is in Germany
